mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID AS menuID, MENU_NAME AS menuName, MENU_URL AS menuUrl, MODULE_ID AS moduleID, IN_USE AS inUse, DISPLAY_ORDER AS displayOrder, PARENT_NO AS parentNo FROM menus WHERE MODULE_ID IN (SELECT m.MODULE_ID FROM module m LEFT JOIN role_module rm ON m.MODULE_ID = rm.MODULE_ID LEFT JOIN role r ON r.ROLE_ID = rm.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN account_role ar ON ar.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN account a ON a.ACCOUNT_ID = ar.ACCOUNT_ID WHERE a.ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountID})
